channel.title: git on Mike's ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in git on Mike's ramblings

item.title: Moving git repositories
item.description: So whilst moving between github organisations - which is relatively straight forward, I also had to move some from Atlassian Stash unfortunately there’s not as simple a method to do this, but a good way of mirroring between two repos is as follows: $ git clone https://donor_repo/example1 --bare $ git remote set-url --push origin https://destination_repo/example2.git $ git fetch -p origin && git push --mirror Simples.
